sentence.Network_en: The British are often accused of being insular.
sentence.Network_cn: 英国人常被指责为思想褊狭。

sentence.Network_en: A continental climate is different from an insular one.
sentence.Network_cn: 大陆性气候不同于岛屿气候.

sentence.Network_en: Having lived in one place all his life, his views are insular.
sentence.Network_cn: 他一辈子住在一个地方, 所以思想狭隘.

英语词根前缀后缀大全_百度文库 ... insul=island 岛 insular 岛的，偏狭的 it=go 行走.
AMG 音乐情绪词典 ... Innocent 天真地 Insular 孤立的 Intense 强烈的.
张红岩TOEFL ... insufferable adj. 难以忍受的 insular adj. 海岛的，狭隘的 insult v.n. 侮辱，凌辱.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 16th cent. (as a noun denoting an islander): from late Latin insularis, from insula 'island'

entry.tran: 孤立的;保守的;思想狭隘的
entry.def: If you say that someone is insular, you are being critical of them because they are unwilling to meet new people or to consider new ideas.

example.ex: ...the old image of the insular, xenophobic Brit.
example.tran: 孤立保守而又恐外的英国人的旧有形象

means.word_mean: 1. relating to or characteristic of or situated on an island;
2. suggestive of the isolated life of an island;

sentences.sentence: "an exceedingly insular man; so deeply private as to seem inaccessible to the scrutiny of a novelist"- Leonard Michaels

means.word_mean: 3. narrowly restricted in outlook or scope;

auth_sentence.content: Chilean society is unusually insular and socially conservative.
auth_sentence.res_content: Chilean society is unusually insular and socially conservative.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Chilean society is unusually insular and socially conservative.

auth_sentence.content: In this hyper-connected world, insular industries will be left behind.
auth_sentence.res_content: In this hyper-connected world, insular industries will be left behind.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: In this hyper-connected world, insular industries will be left behind.

auth_sentence.content: But why label them narrow-minded and insular?
auth_sentence.res_content: But why label them narrow-minded and insular?
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But why label them narrow-minded and insular?

insul岛屿,sul有'单独'之意+in表示"……素"→n.胰岛素

stems_affixes.value_cn: 隔离,孤立;使绝缘,使绝热
stems_affixes.word_buile: insul岛屿,sul有'单独'之意+ate表动词→变成岛的状态→隔离

sentences.en: A continental climate is different from an insular one.
sentences.cn: 大陆性气候不同于岛屿气候。

means.word_mean: 只关心本国利益的；思想偏狭的；保守的
